channel.title: Changing max # of players & save intervals ? -thanks in advance
channel.description:
thanks for looking!!!!
i need to know where and how to change how often my server saves an account.... and also where i can change max players ...
a segment of code would be nice but if not anything will help thanks again!!!

item.title: Changing max # of players & save intervals ? -thanks in advance
item.dc:creator: @Bando Bando
item.description:
@Bando wrote:

How come when i change the players right there in player.java, when that many players is reached the server freezes…WTF!

Read full topic
